name: Mitchella
Relationship: Compare: CHIMAPH.; SENECIO; UVA; GERAN.; GOSSIP.

Female: Dysmenorrhoea and uterine hemorrhage; blood bright red

details: Bladder symptoms accompany complaints, especially uterine congestion.Urinary Organs.Irritation at neck of bladder, with urging to urinate. (EUP-PUR.; APIS.) Dysuria. Catarrh of bladder.
